column3: Traffic;PHNOM PENH: ------A man who appeared to be drunk driving at speed flipped his Land Rover at 1:10 am on Saturday
column6: at the foot of the South Steung Meanchey Bridge.------ Sources say the car was driving down 271 in a south-to-north direction at high speed when it clipped the bridge divider and flipped onto its side.Â The driver
column8: stayed around for some photos and then fled the scene. KBN
